SUB_W09_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Mmm. We appear to be on a city street.
Burgs such as these tend to be pervaded
with darkness, making them just the sort
of place I might meet a worthy thrall.

SUB_W09_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
This here's Avalon, capital of the Kingdom
of Albion, which connects to all worlds.
And this is Avalon Station, the true heart
of the whole place.

SUB_W09_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Ah, so this is your city, Champion.
It seems a fine place—as majestic,
flashy, and corrupted with darkness
as I would expect from your home.

SUB_W09_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Can't deny there's a darkness here:
a deep one that the city's never
really been able to hide.

SUB_W09_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Oh, but I expect my time here
to be most pleasant indeed.

SUB_W09_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.speaker: Train_Conductor
SUB_W09_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.text:
Welcome to Avalon Station,
my fine fellow!

SUB_W09_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_01.text:
I sense great darkness
within this world.

SUB_W09_SCAN_SIUG_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_SCAN_SIUG_000_CUT_000_000.text:
It seems my target is right under my nose.
To think there might be a potentially
worthy thrall here in this crowd!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_00.text:
So many souls crowded into so small
a space... Yes, this is quite the
fascinating spectacle indeed.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_02.text:
I am busy seeking appealing prospects.
Stay out of my way!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_03.text:
Heavens, this new lostling is
certainly a bit of an odd duck... Well, my name is Guinevere, and I have been
tasked by the Crown with fetching lostlings
such as yourself and providing them guidance.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_04.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_04.text:
You would presume to guide the Dismal King?
Very well. I shall deign to hear what you
might have to say.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_05.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_05.text:
Whether this 'prospect' you seek is here or not,
you've an obligation to the Crown to discharge.
Think of it as an entry tax, if you will—and I
do look forward to your prompt payment.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_06.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_06.text:
Oh, but please be at ease! I understand you've
nothing on your person which might be of value
to the Crown, so we'd be simply chuffed to
offer you a different means of payment.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_07.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_07.text: What is a 'tax,' and what could be possibly be of more value than the personage of the lord of darkness himself?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_08.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_08.text:
You may pay your entry tax
by gathering these:

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_09.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_09.text:
They are valuable rocks
known as 'diamonds.'

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_10.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_10.text:
You will go forth and gather items of value
on the streets of Avalon. Said items will
then be converted into diamonds by way of
a secret process known only to the Crown. But I shall spare you the details,
for we've wasted enough time
discussing it already.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_12.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_12.text:
Ah, but those are transportation tickets.
You use them to travel about the city,
ideally gathering items of great value
along the way. I'll let you work out how best to use them,
for that will be the crux of making this
a most successful enterprise.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_13.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_13.text:
Well, regardless of this diamond nonsense,
traveling around the city should prove
rather interesting.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_14.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_14.text:
Were I you, I might perhaps start at the
Canuds department store; I hear one can
acquire rather valuable items there.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_15.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_000_15.text:
And these scraps will permit me to
visit this 'Hannods'? Yes, I see.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_010_00.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_010_00.text: I know that lady. I'm sure of it!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_010_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_010_01.text:
Apparently she wanted nothing to do with
you and your trite descent into darkness.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_010_02.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_010_02.text:
She a friend, maybe? Family member?
Something else entirely? I can't remember...

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_010_03.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_010_03.text:
Well, I won't be much use to ya so long as
I'm up in my head about this. I need to
know who she is, and I'm afraid yer gonna
have to figure that one out, Count.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_010_04.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_110_CUT_010_04.text:
Then I shall get to the bottom of both
Avalon's deep darkness and the identity 
of this mysterious damsel. For the sake of
expediency, let us hope they are connected.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_210_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_210_CUT_000_00.text:
You there! Woman!
I would have words with you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_210_CUT_000_01.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_210_CUT_000_01.text:
Chatting me up right off the cuff?
This lostling certainly is assertive! Yes, well, my name is Guinevere,
and I have been tasked by the Crown
with fetching lostlings such as
yourself and providing them guidance.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_210_CUT_000_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_210_CUT_000_02.text:
You would presume to guide the Dismal King?
Very well. I shall deign to hear what you
might have to say.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_210_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_210_CUT_000_03.text:
Whatever it is you seek here, you've an
obligation to the Crown to discharge first.
Specifically, I need you to gather these:

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_210_CUT_000_09.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_210_CUT_000_09.text:
Were I you, I might perhaps start at the
Canuds department store; I hear one can
acquire rather valuable items there.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_01.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_01.text:
A moment, lad? I'm Detective Inspector Spear
from Avalon Yard—and if I may, you're as
dodgy a fellow as I've seen in all my years.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_03.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_03.text:
Now now, let's not get huffy.
Luckily for us both, I'm in need of
a dodgy lostling such as yourself.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_04.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_04.text:
As it happens, I know a number of chaps who
used to be lostlings—scouted by the queen
herself back in the day, so they were. Point is, mate, I need your help—and you are
going to give it to me, because otherwise
I'll see you thrown in the nick.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_05.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_05.text:
Very well. But do not waste
my time with tedious errands!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_06.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_06.text:
There's a clever lad. Now then, what I need is
for you to put that keen judgement and lostling
power to work locating certain bits and bobs
on the mean streets of Avalon. I know that might seem like a load of old
cobblers at the moment, but it'll all make
sense at the end of the day.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_07.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_07.text:
And what are these slips of
paper you've handed me?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_08.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_08.text:
'Slips of paper'!? Oi, this is gonna
be a proper mess, and no mistake... Those slips are called 'tickets,' lad.
You use them to get about the city.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_09.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_09.text:
Excellent. I had been hoping to see more
of this city of yours. But where I am to
acquire these 'bits and bobs' you desire?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_10.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_10.text:
I'll explain everything, so listen close.
You'll start here, at the World Theatre.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_11.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_11.text:
Jack Street, next to us, is chock-full
of hooligans and cutpurses. Wouldn't normally send a fancy lad like
you to that place, but I think you'll find a
piece there that's key to our investigation.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_12.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_12.text:
Oh, and then there's the Royal Plaza.
You'll mostlike find a minstrel there
performing for tourists, and I wager
he'll have a clue as well.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_12.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_12.text:
Your ultimate destination is the Avalon
police station. But not to worry, lad:
I won't be having the bobbies nick you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_13.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_13.text:
Figure a bloke like you should be
able to take care of himself all right,
so good luck out there. Oh, and mum's the word on this investigation,
so don't go discussing it with any Sid or Nancy who
wanders by. In fact, just don't go discussing it at all.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_14.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_000_14.text:
Very well. I shall deign to aid in your
investigation as I travel this world.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_010_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_010_00.text: Have you any memories of that man?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_010_01.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_010_01.text:
Nah, I don't know any detective inspectors—
in fact, I've never been investigated
for anything in my life!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_010_02.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_010_02.text:
But there's somethin' inside him that doesn't
fit with the whole 'hard detective' shtick.
Somethin' he can't quite hide...

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_010_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_010_03.text:
I noticed this as well. Whether the man intends
it or not, something in his very nature draws
in darkness; the fact he chose to speak to me
is proof enough of that.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_010_04.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_310_CUT_010_04.text:
And ya just drag folk into that darkness
right along with ya. Yer one hell of a
scary fellow, Count.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_110_CUT_000_000.text:
And just as I use the last of my tickets,
I find myself back at Avalon Station.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_110_CUT_000_010.text:
Made it back safely, did you lostling?
Well done! Now be a chap and show me
all the valuable items you've gathered
so I can turn them into diamonds.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_110_CUT_000_020.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_110_CUT_000_020.text:
Heavens, this is simply brilliant!
That was merely meant to be a training
course, yet you managed to gather more
than any lostling I've ever known!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_110_CUT_000_030.text:
Well, this is smashing! If you can get these
sorts of results from the training course,
you'll have your tax sorted in no time—
and maybe even an audience with His Majesty.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_110_CUT_000_040.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_110_CUT_000_040.text: Well, better than a swift kick in the bum, I suppose. Still, this was just a training course, so as long as you show better results on the real thing, it should all be grand.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_110_CUT_000_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_110_CUT_000_050.text:
Well, that's gone all to pot—and you were
only on the training course! At this rate,
it's hard to imagine you'll ever discharge
your duty to the Crown. Were I you, I'd do it again—and take it
seriously this time, unless you fancy being
tossed into the royal dungeons.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_110_CUT_000_060.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_110_CUT_000_060.text:
Now then, if you feel you adequately
understand your duty, you may proceed
to the next course. Or if you still lack for
confidence, you can try this one again.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_110_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_110_CUT_000_070.text: I see no problem. We move on.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_110_CUT_000_100.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_110_CUT_000_100.text:
This old gold ring here, you mean?
Yes, that is a bit of a mystery.
Must be something of a special case.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_210_CUT_000_110.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_210_CUT_000_110.text:
Did you not bother visiting Canuds?
Or perhaps you simply failed to find
anything of value there? Either way,
I suggest you try again—and harder.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_000_00.text: What will become of these diamonds?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_000_01.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_000_01.text:
They will be presented to the Crown
as your entry tax and used to fund
various aspects of the royal family. For while the Crown's finances are handled
by the government, these diamonds need not
be 'officially' accounted for.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_000_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_000_02.text:
The whole ordeal strikes me
as a terrific bother.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_000_03.text:
Quite—hence why it is my duty to identify
the rare lostling who finds their way here
and send them to gather valuables that
might be converted into diamonds.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_000_04.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_000_04.text:
And yet I suspect your worth
is far greater than that.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_000_05.speaker: Guinevere

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_000_06.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_000_06.text:
Right then! You'll be on a different course
next time, and may end up visiting more
dangerous places and encountering even
dodgier individuals—so do take care.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_000_07.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_000_07.text: And where am I headed next?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_000_08.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_000_08.text:
Begin with Nobleman's Square. It's where
the nobility of Albion tend to congregate,
but commoners may visit without issue.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_000_09.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_000_09.text:
This seems a place where valuable
items should exist in plenty.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_010_00.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_010_00.text:
Folks say Albion was once home to an honorable
band called the Knights of the Round Table.
Accordin' to legend, they were chosen by the
queen and pledged eternal loyalty to the king.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_010_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_010_01.text:
Mmm. And their rule of this land
is what created the darkness that
now pervades it?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_010_02.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_010_02.text:
Nah, that's just a legend. You've seen what
a mess the streets of Avalon are: honorable
knights are nowhere to be seen. Hell, these're the streets where I looked to
harden m'self so I could leave a legacy
as the best there ever was.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_010_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_120_CUT_010_03.text:
Let us continue your story after this circuit
of the city, Champion. We've business in
Nobleman's Square—perhaps there we might
learn the true source of Avalon's darkness.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_220_CUT_000_01.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_220_CUT_000_01.text:
I will have it appraised so I might see
if it is worth presenting to the king—
in truth, I suspect it may have even
greater value than the diamonds.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_220_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_220_CUT_000_03.text:
Never, my little lostling—and it
makes me suspect you might be a
terrifically special fellow indeed.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_220_CUT_000_04.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_220_CUT_000_04.text:
That I am special is beyond question.
The question is, are you?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_220_CUT_000_08.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_220_CUT_000_08.text:
Try Nobleman's Square. It's where Albion's
nobility tends to congregate, but commoners
may visit without issue. And of course, such nobles are known
to possess precious items.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_220_CUT_000_09.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_220_CUT_000_09.text: Precious items, is it? Let us see.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_120_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_120_CUT_000_000.text:
I am beginning to grow accustomed
to traveling through these new,
non-carriage forms of conveyance.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_120_CUT_000_020.text:
Heavens, this is simply brilliant!
Have you been to Avalon before?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_120_CUT_000_030.text:
Well, this is just smashing!
Let's keep it up, shall we?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_120_CUT_000_040.text:
Better than a swift kick in the bum,
I suppose—though I encourage you
to try harder next time.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_120_CUT_000_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_120_CUT_000_050.text:
Well, this has gone all to pot. At this rate,
you're mere moments from being tossed into
the royal dungeons—and I've not the faintest
what might happen to you after that.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_120_CUT_000_060.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_120_CUT_000_060.text:
Your fate is yours to decide.
Do you wish to try again?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_120_CUT_000_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_120_CUT_000_090.text:
The necklace yet remains. Are you unable
to grasp the value of its darkness?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_120_CUT_000_100.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_120_CUT_000_100.text:
This old gold necklace here, you mean?
Yes, it does appear to be something
of a special case.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_220_CUT_000_110.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_220_CUT_000_110.text:
You didn't visit Nobleman's Square?
Or did you merely run into trouble
with the nobles, perhaps? *sigh* I fear I may have expected rather
too much from a mere lostling...

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_000_00.text:
Both of the items were from locations you
told me to visit; I suspect you know more
of them then you choose to reveal.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_000_01.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_000_01.text:
Heavens, I'm just as surprised as you are!
They're gold and quite old, but I've not had
issues with other gold articles not becoming
diamonds, so I can't claim to understand it. Perhaps the king will have some insight
on the matter. Or perchance...

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_000_03.text:
Mmm. Did I trail off? Apologies. Yes, well, the next course will be the last.
Do try to complete one last circuit before
your lostling power dissipates completely.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_000_03.text:
The next course will be the last.
Do try to complete one last circuit before
your validity as a lostling expires.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_000_05.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_000_05.text:
If lostlings were to generate too many
diamonds, their value would crater overnight.
This is why we require but a single lostling
at any given time, you see.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_000_06.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_000_06.text:
So there is a fixed timeframe to a lostling's
power, and those who use that power can more
easily draw out the darkness of Avalon?
Give me the next slips of paper at once!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_000_07.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_000_07.text:
Heavens, my lostlings aren't usually quite
so motivated! I'm chuffed you appreciate
the value you bring to Avalon.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_000_08.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_000_08.text:
Now then, this route will be rather
different: it begins at the royal palace,
and will likewise conclude there once
you make a full circuit of the city.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_000_09.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_000_09.text: And where would you have me visit?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_000_10.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_000_10.text:
Knowing you, it'd be a wonder if
you didn't end up there even if I
held my tongue in check. Regardless, I'd think it worth your while
to pop by the Royal Museum of Albion.
As a visitor to our land, I'm certain
you'll find it a fascinating place.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_020_00.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_020_00.text:
The royal family's desperate to get their
hands on those diamonds—and I'm sure those
orders come straight from the queen.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_020_01.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_020_01.text:
Current queen came to Albion after the
former one vanished. Next anyone knew,
she was rulin' as the king's co-regent! They say all the pride and dignity
of Albion disappeared after that.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_020_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_020_02.text:
Interesting. Perhaps she is the source of
the darkness that blankets all of Avalon.
I would very much like to meet this queen.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_020_03.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_020_03.text:
Whenever I won a championship, I got to meet
the king and queen as part of the prize—
but our conversations were so vapid,
I barely remember 'em. I just remember they prized winning
and success, as if those were the best
things they could possibly conceive of.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_020_04.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_020_05.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_130_CUT_020_05.text:
If anyone was ignorant, it was me.
I thought I was better than them—
was convinced of it, in fact!
But I paid for it in the end.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_230_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_230_CUT_000_00.text:
The items acquired from the locations you
directed me to are the only ones that don't
become diamonds. That can be no coincidence.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_230_CUT_000_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_230_CUT_000_01.text:
The Dismal King will abide no
more of your dissembling!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_230_CUT_000_02.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_230_CUT_000_02.text:
You truly are smart as anything, Siugnas;
I can conceal nothing from your gaze.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_230_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_230_CUT_000_03.text:
Well, then! If explanations you want,
explanations you shall have. Some time ago, I committed a crime.
As recompense, I was ordered to find
lostlings and use them to collect diamonds,
which I then offer up to His Majesty. Having now performed this service for no
small amount of time, I feel I have
sufficiently atoned for my actions.
And yet...

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_230_CUT_000_04.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_230_CUT_000_04.text:
And yet your king has not forgiven you,
so you now seek a way to break free
from your gilded cage.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_230_CUT_000_05.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_230_CUT_000_05.text:
Ever one step ahead, aren't you? But yes,
it is as you say: I am gathering gold items
to which the king's power does not extend
so I might use them to barter my freedom. So yes, Siugnas, the Dismal King.
I do have another motive here.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_230_CUT_000_06.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_230_CUT_000_06.text:
How many more of these
items do you require?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_230_CUT_000_07.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_230_CUT_000_07.text:
If I can acquire just one more,
I think that should prove sufficient.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_230_CUT_000_10.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_230_CUT_000_10.text:
But I suspect you already
know that, don't you?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_130_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_130_CUT_000_000.text:
And we're back at the royal palace.
I do look forward to meeting
the rulers of this world.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_130_CUT_000_010.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_130_CUT_000_010.text:
A royal audience depends on how many diamonds
you have gathered. So let's have a gander and see
if His Majesty will be chuffed to bits or tossing you
into his gaol.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_130_CUT_000_040.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_130_CUT_000_040.text:
Well, it's better than a swift kick
in the bum, I suppose.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_130_CUT_000_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_130_CUT_000_050.text: Well, this has gone all to pot.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_130_CUT_000_060.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_130_CUT_000_060.text:
It appears you can safely expect
His Majesty's gratitude. Now let us
take these diamonds into the palace.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_130_CUT_000_070.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_130_CUT_000_070.text:
Let us take these diamonds into the palace.
As for what will happen next, we'll simply
have to see what mood His Majesty is in.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_130_CUT_000_080.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_130_CUT_000_080.text:
This scant quantity of diamonds buys
you nothing but a one-way ticket
to the royal dungeons.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_130_CUT_000_120.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_130_CUT_000_120.text:
The wand I acquired at the museum isn't
turning into diamonds, but I feel certain
that comes as no surprise to you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_130_CUT_000_130.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_130_CUT_000_130.text:
An old golden wand, is it?
Yes, that's exactly the sort of thing
which cannot be turned to diamonds.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_230_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_230_CUT_000_000.text:
I do look forward to meeting
the rulers of this world.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_230_CUT_000_140.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_230_CUT_000_140.text:
No wand, I see. This speaks volumes
about your intentions, Siugnas.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_230_CUT_000_150.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_230_CUT_000_150.text:
And cheers for bringing me the
third golden item I required.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Welcome back, Lady Guinevere.
'Tis a pleasure to see you again.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_000_010.text:
The pleasure is all mine, good sir.
I've a lostling here who stands
ready to pay his entry tax.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_000_020.text:
A lostling, eh? Excellent work!
You may enter.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_000_030.text:
And if I may be so bold, Lady Guinevere,
I eagerly look forward to the day you
might return to the palace for good.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_000_050.text:
I am but a captive
and a criminal.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_000.text:
This fine offering of diamonds
pleases me, lostling.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_010.text:
If you require a boon, merely name it
and I shall see it done.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_020.text:
I find the darkness that pervades your
world most appealing, and wish to
follow it to its source.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_030.text:
I'm not certain I understand your request,
exactly, but in light of your contribution,
I will allow it. You are dismissed.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_040.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_040.text:
Your efforts in this matter are
appreciated as well, Guinevere.
You may go now.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_050.text:
A moment please, Your Majesty! I have guided a great many lostlings
and secured for you a stunning amount
of diamonds in the process. As such,
I believe I have earned your forgiveness.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_060.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_060.text:
There can be no forgiveness for one who
betrays their own king! Nay, girl, your
atonement will consume a lifetime.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_070.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_070.text:
I do not ask to cease my atonement,
Your Highness. I ask only for freedom,
for that is all I have ever wanted.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_080.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_080.text:
What is the meaning of this, Guinevere?
Would you seek to defy me once more?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_090.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_090.text:
While no subject of Albion can defy their king,
this lostling has shown me your power does not
extend to otherworldly articles such as these.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_100.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_100.text:
You would use these trinkets to
diminish His Majesty's power?
How clever...and how foolish!
Guards! Seize this traitor!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_120.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_120.text:
We cannot apprehend Lady Guinevere!
We'll not turn our arms against
our rightful queen!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_130.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_130.text:
Fie, more traitors in our midst!
But so be it—if you will not follow my
command, you may join her in death!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_140.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_140.text: And what is my part in this?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_160.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_010_160.text: I will observe, and nothing more.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_020_000.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_020_000.text:
I love you, Guinevere my queen—which is
exactly why I cannot forgive your crime. But I am a merciful man, and so will permit
the freedom you desire in the form of exile.
Now begone from here and never return!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_020_020.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_020_020.text:
I leave Lady Guinevere
in your hands, lostling.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_020_030.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_020_030.text: Please take care of m'lady, ser!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_020_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_020_040.text:
Are you satisfied with
this arrangement?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_020_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_020_050.text:
Continue your mission, lostling—
and without delay.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_030_000.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_030_000.text:
Ah, so that's the former Queen Guinevere!
No wonder she looked so familiar. Ya used to see her everywhere—enough that it
made a man sick of all the talk of royalty
and the Knights of the Round Table.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_030_010.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_030_010.text:
Odd I ain't heard of anyone encounterin' her
since disappearin' from the palace—especially
since she wanders around Avalon doing the whole
'lostling' thing. Not too subtle, that.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_030_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_030_020.text:
No one has been treating her like a queen,
and she mostlike had some form of curse cast
upon her as well—a task that would be well
within the ability of her successor. But now, those dark curses have been lifted,
and this world is well on its way to
becoming another tediously dull place.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_030_030.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_030_030.text:
But with the new queen gone, a new history of
Albion can be written. And hell, maybe I can
rewrite my own history—if yer willing to
guide me to a new beginnin', Dismal King!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_040_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_040_000.text:
And with that, the queen has managed to
preserve her dark rule—and for our part,
we learned the source of Avalon's darkness.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_040_010.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_040_010.text:
But with Guinevere gone, there'll be no one
to guide lostlings, and no more diamonds for
the royals. Why would a greedy sort like
the new queen take that kinda risk?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_040_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_040_020.text:
Guinevere is no more mortal than I: she will
return to life and resume her grim atonement.
It is an eternal cycle of darkness set in motion
by the new queen. Impressive, really.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_040_030.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_100_CUT_040_030.text:
Still, one day, Guinevere's gonna succeed
in killin' the queen, and the darkness
over Avalon will finally lift. But until that day, I gotta keep trainin'.
So I beg ya, Dismal King! Guide me to a
life of eternal self-improvement!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_000_000.text:
Greetings, Lady Guinevere. I am surprised
you have chosen to visit us again. Yet would it not be best to accept His Majesty's
judgment that you will not be forgiven and
cannot escape his power, even with the aid
of your skilled lostling?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: Guinevere

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_000_030.text:
Even the gatekeepers greet me as a
nuisance now—but that ends today.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_000_040.text:
An impressive level of confidence.
But is it justified?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_000_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_000_050.text: With your power, I'm certain of it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_010_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_010_050.text:
I am going nowhere, Your Majesty!
Today is the day I win my freedom!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_010_060.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_010_060.text:
Must we go through with this farce again?
A subject of Albion may not defy their king!
What will it take for that to sink in?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_010_070.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_010_070.text:
Ah, but this time
I come prepared...

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_010_080.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_010_080.text:
With this barrier, your royal powers
cannot touch me—indeed, none of you
foul cretins can hope to stop me!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_010_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_010_100.text:
The darkness within her is finally laid bare!
Yet what is the role of the Dismal King
to be in all of this?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_010_120.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_010_120.text: She may do as she will.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_020_000.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_020_000.text:
You have betrayed me, lostling,
and I will not stand for it!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_020_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_020_010.text:
And I had so hoped you might guide this world
deeper into the darkness. But alas, it seems
you are not ready for such a task.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_020_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_020_020.text:
I expect this is something of a
regular occurrence with her?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_020_030.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_020_030.text:
Indeed. Yet death cannot hold Queen Guinevere
for long, so there is nothing to regret.
Still, you have my gratitude for your work.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_020_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_020_040.text:
Then I have much to look forward to!
For with each return from death,
the darkness within will deepen. Ultimately, she will be the one to guide
this world to pandemonium, meaning my part
in this is done for now. Farewell.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_021_010.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_021_010.text:
The relationship between the king and
Queen Guinevere sure is different from
how it's told in the legends. Real tragedy for you, Count, to be
dragged into their lover's quarrel!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_021_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_021_020.text:
In time, Queen Guinevere's darkness will
overpower the king. That will mark the
beginning of a very different Albion.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_021_030.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_021_030.text: I got no interest in these endless cycles of conflict. It's new challenges that drive us to greater heights—and I trust ya to guide me to plenty of those, Dismal King!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_022_010.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_022_010.text:
The relationship between the king and
Queen Guinevere sure is different from
how it's told in the legends. They really gonna just keep
buttin' heads like that forever?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_022_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_022_020.text:
Most likely. The king's power exceeding
Queen Guinevere's seems to be key to the
preservation of Albion—though I look forward
to the day that order breaks down for good.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_030_000.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_030_000.text:
I love you, Guinevere my queen—which is
exactly why I cannot forgive your crime.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_030_010.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_030_010.text:
If you look to kill me, simply call
the headsman and be done with it.
Then this farce will finally be over,
which is all any of us want.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_030_020.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_030_020.text:
If anyone must be punished,
Your Majesty, let it be me!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_030_030.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_030_030.text:
Lancelot? What are you doing here?
There's no point in your dying as well!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_030_040.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_030_040.text:
There can be no going back to our
younger days when we could so readily
forgive each other our trespasses. Nay, we'll not know such until the day our
god calls us home. But on that day, I look
forward to talking and laughing together
as once we did.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_030_050.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_030_050.text:
Now leave my sight, the both of you.
And you stand down as well, lostling—
and go with my gratitude for all that
you have done this day.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_030_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_030_060.text:
What will become of
the two of you now?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_030_070.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_030_070.text:
I will return to hiding and protect the
kingdom from the shadows, as is my duty.
I ask only that you might take care of
the queen in my stead, lostling.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_030_090.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_030_090.text:
Would you even have me, lostling?
Especially after I fought you and was
then rendered powerless?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_031_010.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_031_010.text:
The relationship between Queen Guinevere,
Sir Lancelot, and the king is more than a little
love triangle, eh?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_031_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_031_020.text:
I doubt this king could maintain his rule
without the vast amounts of light and dark
at play within his kingdom. That said, I would very much like to
see what would happen were he to be
overcome by said darkness!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_031_030.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_200_CUT_031_030.text:
Just like you turned yer back on the
light and dove headlong into the dark! Boy, but I admire yer drive—and I hope
you'll permit me to accompany ya on yer
journey into its murky depths!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_110_CUT_010_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_110_CUT_010_050.text:
You find it to the good for your
desires to be quashed like that?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_110_CUT_010_060.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_110_CUT_010_060.text:
For today, I shall have to.
But when the next lostling comes,
surely my wish will be granted.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_110_CUT_010_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_110_CUT_010_070.text:
You are suggesting I proved
inadequate to the task?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_110_CUT_010_080.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_110_CUT_010_080.text:
Those are your words, lostling—not mine.
Regardless, it is now time for you to
pursue your own goals elsewhere.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_110_CUT_020_010.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_110_CUT_020_010.text:
I still don't get what it was
that Queen Guinevere wanted.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_110_CUT_020_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_110_CUT_020_020.text:
For some reason, I was unable to draw the
darkness out of that woman. How could I,
of all people, fail to achieve such in a world
already so saturated with it?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_110_CUT_020_030.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_110_CUT_020_030.text:
Don't think I've ever seen you like this,
Count: it's like Avalon is so dark that
even the Dismal King's at its mercy. Well, at least ya got me to lead, right?
Let me be the proof that ya once
visited this most dismal of cities.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_210_CUT_010_080.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_210_CUT_010_080.text:
Well, to be perfectly frank...you did.
And because you did not heed my requests,
you are now free to do as you will.
Farewell, my failed lostling.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_210_CUT_020_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_210_CUT_020_020.text:
Whatever it may have been, it was a goal
unworthy of forcing a lord of darkness to
dance to her whims. And yet, I rue my
inability to claim her darkness for myself!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_000_020.text:
Right then, let's take a look...
Blimey, this is a terrible haul! Well, we can't have a gormless blighter
like you wandering the streets of Avalon,
so it's off to the dungeons.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_000_030.text:
You would presume to imprison
a lord such as I?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_000_040.text:
I'm sorry there was nothing more I could do to
help you, lostling. Alas, I fear I haven't the
faintest idea what becomes of those banished
to the dungeons...but best of luck all the same.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_010_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_010_000.text:
The Dismal King, confined to a cell?
What madness is this—and how am I to
seek out the darkness that so fascinates
me while trapped in this prison!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_010_010.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_010_010.text:
I'm a champion, and was one long
before King Din gave me the name. From the moment ya led me here, Count,
I looked at this journey as a chance to think
back on my roots as this world's reigning paragon.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_010_020.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_010_020.text:
And those roots were planted here in this cell.
Poor and starvin', I turned to thievery—but the
powers that be caught me, beat me, and dumped
me in this dank hell. My whole goal became escape, and in order
to do so, I embarked on a gruelin' effort to
become a man worthy of the title of champion.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_010_030.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_010_030.text:
And now, I wanna do it all over again:
discard everything I was and remake myself
as <i>yer<i> champion! So I beg of ya, Dismal King,
give me permission to do just that!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_010_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_010_040.text: Then you shall have the brand.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_010_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_010_050.text: I will give it to you later.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_010_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_010_060.text:
I welcome you into my thrall, Champion.
I now have you in my gaze at all times.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_010_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_010_070.text:
Your blood will become a part of me,
and will make me the Dismal King.
Together into eternity shall we live.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_010_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_120_CUT_010_080.text:
I appreciate the sentiment.
Let us leave it there for now.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_000.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_000.text:
Well, look who's still in one piece!
Sure am chuffed to see it, mate; Avalon's
full of dangerous places and types, much
as it shames an old bobby like me to admit.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_010.text:
Now then, let's see if your eye for things
has met our expectations. That's what'll
determine whether this investigation
advances or not.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_020.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_020.text:
Blimey, this is a proper haul!
Sure you're playing fair out there?
Oi, you know what? I don't care.
Results are all that matters.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_030.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_030.text:
Now this here's a right cracking job.
His Majesty will be buzzing about this,
and no mistake.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_040.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_040.text:
Eh, bog-standard, I suppose. But try giving it
some welly next time, lad—it'll make everything
run more smoothly down the road.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_050.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_050.text: Blimey, but this is a right dog's dinner! Maybe I wasn't clear the first time—just being a lostling is a crime, and the only way to stay out of the nick is to bring His Majesty diamonds. What you've got here just won't do at all.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_060.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_060.text:
Right then. If you feel confident,
we'll take the next step. But if you want
to try again, we'll run it back for you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_090.text:
Then it seems that triangle
was of no value after all.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_100.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_100.text:
Not about value, lad; these 'triangles' are
vital bits of evidence for our investigation.
Now then, thanks much for your cooperation,
and I hope you'll see fit to keep these coming.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_110.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_110.text:
Not about value, lad; this 'triangle' is a
vital bit of evidence for our investigation.
In fact, I've a suspicion there's another
one of them still out there somewhere.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_120.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_310_CUT_000_120.text:
Didn't find all the triangular objects?
Or could you simply not be arsed to visit
the key sites of this investigation?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_000_00.text:
And what is the purpose
of these triangles?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_000_01.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_000_01.text:
Sorry, mate; can't be sharing confidential
details with the likes of you. Just trust me
on this: triangles have the power to change
the fate of this world. ...Or am I just taking the piss
out of you here, mate?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_000_03.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_000_03.text:
Ha ha ha! Just make sure you
don't let any triangles slip
between your fingers, right?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_000_04.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_000_04.text:
Right then! On to the next.
This time, we'll be starting
at Nobleman's Square.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_000_05.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_000_05.text:
Your goal is to reach Avalon Station—
and the key site in this part of the
investigation is the Broadcast Tower.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_000_06.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_000_06.text:
Also, you'll probably run into a pickpocket
or three around these parts. They should
have some useful information, so make sure
to have a proper chinwag with 'em.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_020_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_020_00.text:
Do triangles possess a special meaning
for Avalon? Or perhaps Albion as a whole?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_020_01.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_020_01.text:
I've known plenty who thought wearing a triangle
necklace or whatnot would give 'em strength—
but be it triangles or God, nothin' rains down
blessings on people too lazy to earn 'em.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_020_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_020_02.text: That inspector hardly seems a man of faith. This must not be about belief, but rather about these triangles specifically.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_020_03.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_020_03.text:
Wait, so this mystery
stumps even you? Wow.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_020_04.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_320_CUT_020_04.text:
If we could solve the mystery so easily,
it would take all the fun out of traipsing
about Avalon, don't you think?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_320_CUT_000_020.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_320_CUT_000_020.text: Blimey, this is a proper haul!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_320_CUT_000_030.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_320_CUT_000_030.text: Now this here's a cracking job.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_320_CUT_000_050.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_320_CUT_000_050.text: Now this is a right dog's dinner!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_320_CUT_000_060.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_320_CUT_000_060.text:
Your fate is yours to decide.
Do you wish to try again?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_320_CUT_000_090.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_320_CUT_000_090.text:
Looks like you found all the triangles,
which means I can wrap up my
investigation all nice and neat.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_000_00.text:
I have gathered four of your triangles.
Is this not sufficient?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_000_01.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_000_01.text:
Don't be so hasty there—
still got places I need you
to visit on the next course.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_000_02.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_000_02.text:
This one runs from the station
to the royal palace.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_000_03.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_000_03.text:
Oh, and stop off at the hospital
on the way. You should be able to
get to the graveyard from there.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_000_04.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_000_04.text:
And where will I find
another triangle?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_000_05.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_000_05.text:
Gravekeeper has some kind of information,
but that's all I know; bloke refused to
talk to a copper.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_000_06.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_000_06.text: I'll see that he speaks to me.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_000_07.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_000_07.text:
This one could go pear-shaped in a
hurry, so stay on your toes.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_020_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_020_00.text:
So the gravekeeper guards a secret?
Mmm. At long last, we near the root
of Avalon's darkness.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_020_01.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_020_01.text:
Still can't figure out who that inspector
really is or what he's playin' at here.
Think it's gonna be a problem, Count?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_020_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_020_02.text:
If you are unwilling to step into the
dim light of uncertainty, you will
never reach the true dark.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_020_03.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_020_03.text:
Ha! Bit of a gambler,
aren't ya, Count!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_010_00.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_010_00.text:
All right, mate, this is our final course.
I've got nothing what needs investigating,
so just kick back and enjoy everything
Avalon has to offer.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_010_01.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_010_01.text:
Oh, but make sure you don't wind up
in the king's dungeon—still got that
little ace to worry about.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_010_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_010_03.text:
The last one? Mmm.
I will make the most of it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_030_00.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_030_00.text:
That inspector looks like he's
ready to make some kind of move.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_030_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_030_01.text:
Indeed, the taint of darkness
is receding from him.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_030_02.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_OPENING_330_CUT_030_02.text:
Just promise me we ain't gonna
end up in the dungeon, Count.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_330_CUT_000_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_330_CUT_000_010.text:
Well, mate? How'd it go? Goes without saying
I can't have you ending up in the dungeon,
so if you don't meet the king, your problems
are gonna become mine.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_330_CUT_000_060.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_330_CUT_000_060.text:
Cor, you really cracked on here, mate.
His Majesty should be proper satisfied,
so let's get these diamonds to the palace.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_330_CUT_000_070.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_330_CUT_000_070.text:
Eh, nothing for it but to take your diamonds
to the royal palace and hope His Majesty
is in a forgiving mood.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_330_CUT_000_080.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_330_CUT_000_080.text:
You having a laugh here, mate?
'Cause His Majesty's gonna have
you strung up by your thumbs.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_330_CUT_000_120.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_330_CUT_000_120.text:
And what of this item I
acquired in the graveyard?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_330_CUT_000_130.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ENDING_330_CUT_000_130.text:
Just hold on to that for now, mate;
looks better in your mitts than
it would in the grip of some lowly
detective inspector.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_000_000.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_000_000.text:
Out of the way, you daft mug! Got a
lostling here what's got an offering
of diamonds for His Majesty.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_000_010.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_000_010.text:
Not so fast there! Who are you and...
Cor blimey, look at those diamonds!
I've never seen so many before!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_000_020.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_000_020.text:
You really think that's enough
diamonds to let me grant you an
audience with His Majesty!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_000_030.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_000_030.text: What say you look into my eye?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_000_040.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_000_040.text: Oh my giddy aunt! Y-you... You're...

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_000_050.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_000_050.text:
We know the way. Oh, and that's some
fine work, mate. Keep it up.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_040.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_040.text:
Please accept my offering as well,
Your Majesty!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_060.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_060.text:
Before those dastards used those strange
triangles to seal it away, this sword
symbolised sovereignty over Albion.
It belongs at your side, Your Majesty.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_070.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_070.text:
By all that's holy... Lancelot!
It's you! You've returned to us!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_080.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_080.text:
I have borrowed the power of this lostling to
break the seal, and am now yours to command.
With this sword, I swear to slay all who might
seek to bring evil to your realm!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_090.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_090.text:
The only one bringing evil to this realm
is you, Lancelot! Or have you forgotten
that you committed the crime of treason
against your own king?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_100.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_100.text:
I am a criminal and do not deny it. But only
the king can pass judgment over me—and
your vile hold over him is first among the
evils that will fall to this blade!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_110.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_110.text:
No matter how much power that sword contains,
no citizen of Albion is able to defy the king.
You should know this more than most, Lancelot.
...Now give him an order, Your Majesty!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_140.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_140.text:
You always were a fool, Lancelot!
Did you truly think to march in here
and slay me like some hero of old?
To beg the forgiveness of your king? Oh, but seeing a man on his knees is a most
unseemly thing—so let me put an end to your
days of pleading by killing you here and now!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_150.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_150.text: And what is my part in all this?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_170.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_170.text: I will observe and nothing more.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_180.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_180.text:
So this blade is a symbol of sovereignty?
Yet a true ruler needs no symbols to establish
their dominion. Alas, you expose your weakness
by yearning for the accoutrements of power!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_190.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_190.text:
Keep such thoughts to yourself if you value your
life, you feeble lostling! You may have gathered
power from throughout the Conjoined Worlds,
but this world is ours by right!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_200.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_010_200.text:
The one who misunderstands her place is you.
For you stand before the Dismal King, a ruler
true who cares naught for your 'rights'!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_020_000.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_020_000.text:
Lancelot, my dear friend. I am gladdened to
see you again, and gladdened even more that
you freed me from that woman's cruel yoke.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_020_010.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_020_010.text:
And yet, I am a criminal still. Even if I
did it to safeguard her, the fact remains
I absconded with your queen and
pledged to her my eternal love. I have betrayed my king, and in
so doing proven myself unworthy
to stand at your side.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_020_020.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_020_020.text:
But if ever your life is in danger, I shall be
there—which is why it remains my fervent
hope we never again see each other.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_020_050.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_020_050.text:
I must quit this place for a while;
the king's majesty would only be
diminished by the criminal Lancelot
running about unpunished. Perhaps a certain lostling might consider
letting me accompany him on a journey
through the Conjoined Worlds?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_030_000.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_030_000.text:
Can't believe that inspector turned out to be
the legendary Sir Lancelot! And he was every part
the hero of legend—no, BETTER than the legend!
How can I call myself a champion now?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_030_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_030_010.text:
You have your own path to walk. He may indeed
be a living legend, but that does not mean you
must follow in his footsteps, for you are a
champion in your own right.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_030_020.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_030_020.text:
Yeah, and I'll walk my own champion's path!
I only hope you, Count—nay, my Dismal King—
will be there to see it!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_040_010.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_040_010.text:
Damn! Even the legendary Sir Lancelot's no
match for that queen! But even if it costs 
my life, I'll never bend the knee or bow my
head to her—because I'm Champion!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_040_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_040_020.text:
Perhaps it was that strong will that guided
you to Brighthome, Champion. Regardless,
long have I known you were different from
the other members of our warrior band.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_040_030.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_300_CUT_040_030.text: And wouldja treat me as yer champion, Dismal King? Or am I just another servant? I'd hear yer answer!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_310_CUT_010_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_310_CUT_010_040.text:
You find it to the good for your
desires to be quashed like that?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_310_CUT_010_050.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_310_CUT_010_050.text:
That's the way it goes sometime, mate.
My investigation didn't pan out either.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_310_CUT_010_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_310_CUT_010_060.text:
Are you suggesting I was
inadequate to the task?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_310_CUT_010_070.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_310_CUT_010_070.text:
Oh, you were, mate.
You very much were. I'd thought you might suffice, but there's
nothing for it but for me to start over
and try again. Here's hoping you have
better luck with your own goals.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_310_CUT_030_000.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_310_CUT_030_000.text:
Inspector there never did let
his true identity slip, eh?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_310_CUT_030_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_310_CUT_030_010.text:
Infuriating, isn't it? Did you hear how he
spoke to me? The man has no respect
for the Dismal King!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_310_CUT_030_020.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_310_CUT_030_020.text: Are you sayin' even you couldn't lure him into the darkness?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_310_CUT_030_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_310_CUT_030_030.text:
Were those infernal triangles the key to
the darkness? Mark my words, Champion—
a day will come when I redeem myself
of this humiliation.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_310_CUT_030_040.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_310_CUT_030_040.text:
Well, you can always lure me into the dark
instead. 'Cause when the Dismal King's mad,
it's our job to appease ya!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_320_CUT_000_020.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_320_CUT_000_020.text:
Right then, let's take a look...
Blimey, this is a terrible haul! Well, we can't have a gormless blighter
like you wandering the streets of Avalon,
so it's off to the dungeons.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_320_CUT_000_040.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_LAST_320_CUT_000_040.text:
You've been angling for a trip to the
dungeons this whole time, mate, and
now you get it. Hope it was worth it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.text:
People have lined up in droves.
For what purpose?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.text:
Cheers, love! I'm the songstress!
I'm so glad ye came to see me,
and I hope ye enjoy this wee
signed photoprint!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.text:
New song's gonna be a fine one,
so keep yer ears open!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.text: What in all the worlds was that?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
Hello there, love—I'm the songstress!
Cheers for supportin' me!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Fan_Utahime
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
Oh my gosh, I am your BIGGEST fan!
Please take this! PLEASE!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
A gift for me, is it?
Aye, I'll treasure it always.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text: And gratitude to you as well, love!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
To be honest, I've been in a wee strop today,
but gettin' so many gifts from my fans cheered
me up straightaway. Now please just sit back
and enjoy my new song!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
The sun comes up and morning calls.
Without ye, I cannae go on.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
Can ye make yer way back to me, O love?
Can ye make yer way back to me?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
So I go to Giant Moch Forest and daren't
look back. Oh no, I daren't look back.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text: The sun rises away, above me so far.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text: I must bear the dark as night falls.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
I'll be off now 'cause
vultures are screechin'.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
I howl in the black!
I'm fiercer than dawn!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
Let this fool hop on and
we'll be off, Golden Baum!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text: And I cross the darkness alone.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
Aye, singin' that perks me right up.
Thanks so much for listenin'!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_020_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_020_CUT_0.text:
The line grows longer still. Clearly this
woman possesses something which
excites the hearts of mankind.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_020_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_020_CUT_0.text:
Oh, cheers! 'Tis fine to see ye again!
I've nothin' but this wee token for ye,
but I hope it shows how grateful I am.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.text:
Thank ye all sooo much for comin'!
I'm afraid the signing's over now,
so apologies to anyone in the queue.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.text:
You made it all the way to the front
of the queue at the moment it ended?
Oh, now that's just TERRIBLE luck! You must be gutted, mate! You must be cheesed off!
If it were me, I'd be screamin' to the heavens,
you know? Hell, you must be the most cursed
bloke in the entire universe!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.text:
The weak cling to the notion of luck,
but the soul of the Dismal King
is not so fragile a thing.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.text:
You poor sod. Here—take this.
It's the least I can do.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_000_000.text:
A small establishment,
but I find it quite...cozy.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Welcome, sir! We've a fine variety
of fizzy drinks if you'd like,
so please help yourself.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Oi! I 'eard a rumour what blokes could drink
for free at this 'ere pub—gimme a shot of
the good stuff and keep it comin', bird!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_000_030.text:
I believe you've entered the
wrong establishment, sir.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Think so, do ya? Well, you got bottles
and I got a thirst, so what bloody
difference does it make?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Unfortunately for you, sir,
we've a new bouncer on the job.
...Ahem. ...AHEM.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_000_060.text:
You would presume to make an ostiary
of the Dismal King? Impressive.
This girl may have potential.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_010_000.text:
Ah, but that was delightful.
I deem it a sufficient reward.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_010_010.text:
I'm quite pleased that you're happy, sir.
But if you've still a thirst, I could perhaps
craft you something from our world-famous
mocktail menu.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_020_000.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_020_000.text:
Hm. It appears I chose the wrong patron
to appoint as our bouncer.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_020_010.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_000_CUT_020_010.text:
Now then, anyone who finds themselves
in the wrong place, please do leave.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Ah, our lucky customer! I've a wager
for you sir: win a game against me,
and I'll double your belongings.
But lose, and it all goes away. Also, as this is your destiny,
there is no getting out of it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_010_CUT_000_010.text:
As if I had any intention
of attempting escape.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, you're a confident one, aren't you?
Oh, I do so love a confident customer! Now, if the card is a heart, you win. 
But if it's a joker, the game is mine.
Shall we begin?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_010_CUT_010_000.text:
Seems luck is on your side today—
and in a way, the heart on this card
is my own as well. Now go on, love.
Take your winnings.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_010_CUT_010_010.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_010_CUT_010_010.text:
Oh, now that's a right shame: you doubled
up, but actually have nothing to double.
Well, perhaps you'd take my heartfelt
feelings instead, love?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_010_CUT_020_000.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BAR_010_CUT_020_000.text:
Well, I see this fickle clown
is no friend of yours.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Welcome to the Royal Museum of Albion, good sir.
To celebrate our bicentennial anniversary, we are
presenting commemorative gifts to our visitors.
I do hope you will accept one.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_010.text: I will deign to accept it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Also, our newest exhibit, 'The Hidden
Treasures Beneath Avalon,' is scheduled
to open in but a few days.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Beneath the streets of Avalon lie not only
lost treasures, but unimaginably terrifying
creatures just waiting to awaken from their
eternal slumber!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_040.text:
But those, of course, will not be part
of the display. Regardless, please do
come back and see it. Pip pip!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_020.text:
I almost cannot believe this myself,
sir, but you are this museum's
one BILLIONTH visitor!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_040.text:
I'm chuffed as chips I lived to see this day,
and must insist you accept this to mark this
most monumental of occasions.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_050.text:
Might I also recommend you visit our
permanent exhibit, 'Magic and Folklore'? It contains numerous archaeological specimens
from throughout the grand history of Albion,
many of which were said to have been preserved
through powerful magic!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_060.text:
It's quite the spectacle, if I do say so myself.
Indeed, upon seeing it, you might even begin to
suspect that I myself am a sorcerer of the most
arcane and powerful type!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_070.text:
But that, of course, would be folly,
so please set worry aside and enjoy
the exhibit at your leisure.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_040.text:
To you, our esteemed billionth visitor,
I'm pleased to extend a special invitation
to a behind-the-scenes tour of our newest
exhibit, 'Magic and Folklore'!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_070.text:
Then allow me to present
you with this.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_080.text:
Ah, but I did have a reason for inviting
you into our back garden, so to speak:
this golden wand. I debated to the last whether or not
to place it on display, but fearing it
may have been included by mistake,
I chose to remove it from the exhibit.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_090.text:
Mmm. I do not sense much in
the way of power from this.
