SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_100.text:
Alas, I'd hoped a lostling such as yourself
might sense something from the wand, but it
is clearly not to be. In that case, perhaps
I shall ask Lady Guinevere to examine it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_110.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_110.text:
And it is for this purpose that you
crafted the ruse of my being the
billionth visitor to this menagerie?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_120.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_120.text:
Pray do not speak such things aloud, sir,
for I feel certain neither of us wishes to
see the fine reputation of the museum
dragged through the gutter!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_130.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_130.text:
Now if you would be so kind,
take this with you as well.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Police_Inspector
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.text:
Oi! Yer one'a them lostlings, ain'tcha? Well,
we'll be needin' your 'elp with an investigation,
lostling, so I'm gonna go ahead and nick one'a
them lovely little items ya gathered.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Police_Inspector
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.text:
Turns out there's a criminal syndicate what's
using the connection 'tween lostlings and the
royal family to unjustly enrich 'emselves. So we'll be needin' to take a butcher's at this
'ere item of yours, see if it's connected to
said criminal syndicate. Now be a good lad
and 'and it over, eh?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Police_Inspector
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.text:
Oi, what's this, mate? You ain't got a damn
thing on ya! Well you're a right muppet of
a lostling, ain'tcha? Run along, ya skiver!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.text:
Greetings, sir, and welcome to Deeps. 
What can I help you with today? Footwear?
A bag? A fine hat? Or perhaps we could
tailor a new suit specially for you?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.text:
Or perchance you seek something
else entirely, lostling?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.text:
I suspect you know exactly
what it is that I seek.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.text:
Here at Deeps, we strive to meet our
customers' every desire—and as such,
I trust this item will more than satisfy. Said item, however, is provided as-is,
and solely at the customer's risk.
Caveat emptor, sir!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.text:
We greatly look forward
to serving you again.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.text:
And I expect you will
have the opportunity.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SHOPINGSTREET_010_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SHOPINGSTREET_010_CUT_.text:
Back for a little more of
you-know-what, are you?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SHOPINGSTREET_010_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SHOPINGSTREET_010_CUT_.text: This time, it shall be mine!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SHOPINGSTREET_100_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SHOPINGSTREET_100_CUT_.text:
Have you any special items which
might only be procured in this shop?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SHOPINGSTREET_100_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SHOPINGSTREET_100_CUT_.text:
Here at Deeps, we strive to meet our
customers' every desire—and as such,
if it is a special item you desire, I trust
this here will more than satisfy. Said item, however, is provided as-is,
and solely at the customer's risk.
Caveat emptor, sir!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.text:
In times of yore, 'twas the Knights of the
Round that bolstered the kingdom of Albion.
But in this day and age, that mantle has
fallen to we of the nobility.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.text:
It is the responsibility of all citizenry
to support the king. Social standing makes
no difference in such things.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.text:
Is that how things work in your country?
Bosh, I saw! Flimshaw! Why, I cannot even imagine living in a place
so uncivilised that it lacks the elites
capable of handling the great burden
my fellows and I must bear. Rubbish, I say! Unadulterated codswallop!
Perhaps I shall educate you as to what
exactly this great burden consists of!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, good heavens, no!
My stars and garters!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.text:
An interesting fellow like that
deserves better than to be murdered.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_01.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_01.text:
Your assistance was hardly necessary, sir.
Nevertheless, it would be unbecoming of a
nobleman not to make a show of gratitude
for your efforts, so take this trinket.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_02.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_02.text:
Do you understand now the great
burden of the nobility?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_00.text:
Come closer, my good man! Yes, there we are.
Now then, as you can see, I am a nobleman
of the great kingdom of Albion, while you
are but a hardscrabble lostling. Therefore, as befits the great burden of
the aristocracy, I am obligated to grant
you succour. However, if you prefer,
I can also proffer greater hardship.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_00.text:
I suspect I know which
you might choose.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_00.text:
Quite right! Not really a difficult
choice at the end of the day, mmm?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_01.text:
That was hardly any great hardship.
Are you truly satisfied?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_01.text:
Of course, my good man—for we in the
aristocracy are men of our word all!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_02.text:
Clearly, I was destined to lose here.
Is that how this works?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.text:
As a nobleman of the great kingdom
of Albion, I possess much in the way
of titles and territory. This necklace, however—a family heirloom we
have treasured for generations—means far more
to me than any lands or peerage. But tragically,
the item has a bit of an issue.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.text:
Mmm. Yes, I do sense a faint
darkness emanating from it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.text:
I'll be hanged! I'd no idea meager
lostlings such as yourself were
capable of discerning such things! Well then, do you also possess the power to
dispel such curses? For that is the burden
which has been imposed upon my house!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.text:
Then I beg of you to do exactly
that, my good man!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.text:
I am finished. At this point,
it is not possible to lift what
you consider to be a curse.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.text:
Yes, I was very much afraid of that.
As such, the best way to free my family
from the necklace's fell hex is to
part with it for good and all. So take it and go, my wretched lostling!
It belongs to you now!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.text:
I find this agreeable, for I doubt it will
give one of my station any trouble.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.text:
Station you say? Gadzooks! Odds bodkins!
I'd no idea you were a fellow noble!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.text:
I am no noble.
I am the Dismal King.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_02.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_02.text:
It seems my house has no choice but
to keep calm and carry on bearing
the necklace's curse for all time. I thank you for your cooperation
regardless, lostling, for I know
you gave your all to the effort.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_030_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_030_CUT_00.text:
I am a nobleman of the great kingdom of Albion—
and you, sir, are a lostling of little renown.
As such, pray consider this my contribution
to the kingdom. Huzzah!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_030_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_NOBLESQUARE_030_CUT_00.text: I see no reason not to accept.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
I was told I would find something of
value here, but how am I to sift
through all of this junk?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
Oh my, what a beautiful young man!
Some sort of foreigner, perhaps? Poor thing looks rather uncomfortable,
but I suppose that's to be expected,
considering this shop deals only in
goods of quality.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
After looking around, the items which caught
my eye are the rusty sword, the leather handbag,
and the old gold ring.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
Oh my days! Fanciable as he is, his eye
for quality is atrocious. Aside from the
leather handbag, the rest of those items
are pure rubbish.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text: I will take the rusty sword.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
He's truly going to take that old sword?
Well, a handsome chap holding a piece of
rubbish is still a handsome chap, at least.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text: I will take the leather handbag.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
My giddy aunt! Did he overhear the
comments I made to myself? Well, a lovely man should be wearing
lovely things, so I've clearly done
my good deed for the day.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text: I will take the old gold ring.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
Well, I'll be switched! Could it be
that dusty old ring is actually an
item of incredible value? No. No, that couldn't possibly be.
It simply couldn't! ...Could it!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.text:
After looking around, the items which
caught my eye are the fresh-baked bread,
the musky cologne, and a taxidermy bird.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.text:
Oh dear. Fanciable as he is, his eye
for quality is simply atrocious! A bunch of weird trash and some bread?
Horrid taste indeed! Also, the dear
must be rather peckish.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.text: I will take this musky cologne.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.text:
See how delights in the smell of beasts!
Strangely attractive, actually...
Heavens, but my blush is rising!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.text: I will take the fresh-baked bread.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.text: What a hungry chap, going straight for the bread. Well, Canuds does have an excellent bakery—even if he wasn't hungry, I doubt he could have resisted the aroma.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.text: I will take the taxidermy bird.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.text: The man must really like birds—perhaps he delights in taking afternoon tea with wild birds in the garden of his palatial estate? Yes, that simply must be the case.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.text:
After looking around, the items which
caught my eye are the stinky fish eggs,
the old gold ring, and these cookies.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.text:
Oh dear. Fanciable as he is, his eye
for quality is atrocious. I suppose the
biscuits might make a fine souvenir,
but the rest is utter rubbish!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.text: I will take the stinky fish eggs.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.text:
Why, that's madness! Why would Canuds
even deign to sell something with such
an indescribably foul stench!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.text:
A perfectly reasonable choice for
a foreigner. Indeed, that's precisely
the sort of item a man of his calibre
should be purchasing.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_030_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_030_C.text:
After looking around, the items which caught
my eye are the muddy mushrooms, the leather
handbag, and that taxidermy bird.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_030_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_030_C.text: I will take the muddy mushrooms.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_030_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_030_C.text:
That sad man must think those
mushrooms are somehow more natural
because they're caked with mud! Does he not have a proper chef at his
estate? Perhaps I should go there and
cook him a proper Sunday roast...

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
To sing, or not to sing,
that is the question.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
That is no question.
You should sing.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Hark, and who is this soothsayer that appears
before me? For while I know you not, I cannot
deny that your words ring most true. For you see, my muse has now urged me forward
in the belief that our next performance should
be one of song! Not that I will be doing the
singing, mind; we have performers for that.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
And who was that muse but you,
O magnificent stranger! Now hasten to me, and quickly! We must finish
this song before the spark of creativity strikes
tinder and burns away—and it is your divine
duty to see this task through!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
I understand little of what you say,
but will play along regardless.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Are you ready, my muse?
If so, step forward!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
The sun comes up and morning calls.
Without you, I cannot go on.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text: Can you find your way back to me?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
I had best go to Giant Moch Forest
and never look back.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Fantastique! Truly, you are a messenger
of the muses—now pray continue!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
The sun rises away,
above me so far.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
I must bear the dark
as night falls.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Better we head home, as the
vultures are screeching.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah. Ahhh! Wonderful!
I stand at my zenith!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
I howl in the black!
I'm fiercer than dawn!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Come to me, Golden Baum,
and let this fool ride upon you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text: And I cross the darkness alone.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text: Oh! Ohhhh! Ohhhh...

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text: What?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
I have completed a lyrical masterwork,
and my next show is bound to be
a great success on every level. You have discharged your divine duty
this day, my muse, and I am blessed
to have met you!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Mmm. I fear I may have let my excitement get
the better of me. But in the cold light of day,
so to speak, perhaps I'll...skip the singing?
Mmm, yes. Definitely skipping the singing.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Success demands ever greater success,
for the hunger of men knows no bounds.
Alas, but how am I to satisfy both
with my next song?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
You need not worry.
Simply heed your own desires.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Oh, if only it were that simple, stranger!
For to reignite the dim flames of creativity,
I am about to do no less than sell my very
soul to the devil!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
And from the way you abruptly appeared
out of nowhere, I can only conclude that
you are, in fact, the devil's servant. So inspire me, demon! And when my masterwork
is complete, you may lay my still-beating
heart at your master's cloven feet!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Very well. I shall peer into
the darkness within you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
But soft! Can you hear it?
The beating of my heart?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
The dream of that night haunts me.
Haunts soul. Haunts heart. Haunts flesh.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
My soul leaps vigorously,
quite like a Maggot Ball.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Ah, I would expect no less
from the devil's thrall!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
For you know the truth:
they hold dominion over all.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
I venture toward the creepy
Gelatinous Matter yonder.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Behold that accursed sky! Behold the
accursed souls quivering in terror!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Ah, why do the poisoned whispers of
a demon make my heart sing so!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
We return from whence we came,
come to greet the true king.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Joy as we cling to victory at the
battle's end! Emerge, O destiny!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
No shame in retreat. See the hope
within the sunflowers abloom in our
souls. We'll not part from this world.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text: Heh. Ha ha. AAAH HA HA HA HA HA HA!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text: Aaah ha ha ha! Yes! Wonderful!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
If this be purgatory, I've nothing
to be afraid of—for Virgil and Homer
will surely be here with me!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Correct. He who has liberated his
own darkness needs fear nothing.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Ah, 'tis the devil's grim attendant—
and yet, I still feel my heart beat
safely within my chest!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Well, I have penned a masterpiece that could
stir even a demon's blackened soul, so I pray
you leave my heart intact until the performance
is ended. I will, of course, pay the necessary
interest to extend our contract.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
But for now, we must prepare for rehearsal!
There are props to make! Arclights to spark!
Scrims to fly in! Costumes to sew!
THEATRE TO CREATE!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text: What an interesting fellow.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
My creation has failed. The devil has reneged on
his end of the bargain, and I am under no further
obligation to yield my heart. So take this to your
vile master instead, demon! Take it and go!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
As if I could merely sell my soul to
the devil for a masterpiece—this world
is not so tepid as all that! But when I think how close I came to losing
the favour of my muse... Well, never again!
I must endure suffering and again confront
the blank page head-on!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
You have come to fear the dark
once more? How tedious.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
Allo there, guv'nor! Welcome to Sorries,
Avalon's most out-RAGEOUS store!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
And what, exactly, makes this
particular store 'outrageous'?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
Never 'eard of Sorries, eh, guv'nor?
Well, not to worry, not to worry—just
stuff one of our famous eel pies in yer
own pie hole and you'll be sorted!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text: Why was it necessary that I fight?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
Cause Sorries 'ere is famous for its
fresh-baked eel pie—and gettin' yerself
the freshest one sometimes takes a bit
of the ol' knuckledust, eh, guv'nor!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
Sorry ya didn't get yerself an eel
pie, guv'nor. Do come again!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text:
Allo there, guv'nor! Welcome to Sorries,
Avalon's most out-RAGEOUS store!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text:
Right then, 'ere ya go!
One Surprise-ade, on the 'ouse!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text:
It's new, it's now, it's Surprise-ade!
What 'appens after ya drink it down?
Only one way to find out, guv'nor!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text:
*cough* Mmm. It seems the force of the
explosion destroyed one of my items.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text:
Well, that was delightful.
What is it made of?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text:
It's a SURPRISE, guv'nor! But trust me,
yer better off not knowin'. Now 'ere—have another for the road!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.text:
Be welcome here, lostling. Take all the
time you like, or hurry on to your destiny—
for those who control their own means
of conveyance control time itself.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.text:
Your transport tickets are no mere scraps of
paper—and this clock tower does so much more
than simply inform people of the time! Yes, time and movement—these are the
constituent elements of our universe.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.text:
If one can control time and movement,
one's objectives can always be obtained! And with that, pray permit me to convert
your transport tickets into other tickets
of equal and equivalent value. Cheers!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.text:
Begging your pardon, but I don't
believe you have enough tickets.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.text:
Excellent.
Then these are for you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_END_0.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_END_0.text:
Do come again! This clock tower
is always open for lostlings.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.text:
Be welcome here, lostling. Take all the
time you like, or hurry on to your destiny—
for those who control their own means
of conveyance control time itself.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.text:
Here I can convert your transport tickets into
other tickets of equal and equivalent value.
The only condition is that you are restricted
to but a single conversion per visit.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.text:
That said, you do not appear to possess
the tickets necessary for conversion.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.text:
Should you wish to continue this transaction,
you'll need courage enough to part with either
one of your valuables or a fragment of your life.
Would you care to do so?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.text: Now I require even more blood.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: Another city slumbers beneath the mean streets of Avalon—and I'm not speaking of the sewers! No, I speak of a place below the sewers, where the ruins of an ancient metropolis lie.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
And this is the entrance
to the ruins?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Quite so, quite so. But just who built
that city, and what is its relationship
to present-day Avalon? Our investigation will illuminate
these truths and a good many more,
should such be of interest to you?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: This does indeed interest me.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: I could not be less interested.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
A shame fellows these days don't
give a ripe fig for archaeology...

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Wonderful! I've been waiting for a bloke
like you to show. I'll just leave the
exploration of the ruins to you, then?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: Now how should I proceed?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: I sense relics in this direction.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: I sense fiends in this direction.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Might this be a relic? I've not gone far,
but perhaps I should still head back.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
There appears to be more to explore,
but which way?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
I've come quite some way and still have
nothing to show for it. What now?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: Return to the surface.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: Continue exploring.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Might this be a relic?
I should head back soon.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Your help in surveying the ruins has been
greatly appreciated, and we would like
to present you with this small token
of our gratitude.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
I say, are you well!? Don't push yourself,
my good man; if someone were to die surveying
these ruins, we'd certainly lose our permit.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ah, I see you've found a relic!
Please take this as your reward.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well now, this doesn't fit the historical
period of the underground metropolis at all.
Wherever did you come across this?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
It was being held by a fiend
I battled in the ruins.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Fascinating! I wager the creature
must have brought it here from
some other place. Well, it's nothing to do with
our research, so you are welcome
to keep it if you like.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text: Another city slumbers beneath the mean streets of Avalon—and I'm not speaking of the sewers! No, I speak of a place below the sewers, where the ruins of an ancient metropolis lie. However, there is an issue...

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text: And what might that be?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text: Er, we've run out of funding.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text: Ah. Farewell, then.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Wait, please! I'm not asking for a charitable
donation, sir, but merely an investment!
Even a small one would suffice—and I'll see
to it you receive an appropriate return.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text: I've no need of such things.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Look, I'm sure we'll turn something up—
we always do, after all! It's just that...
Well, there are two problems, actually. First, some sod came along and nicked what we
dug up, so we need to get that back. But more
urgently, our digging permit is quite limited,
and we can't afford to waste even a single day.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, very well—but mark for yourself
the charity of the Dismal King!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
A thousand thank-yous, my good man!
I'll see to it that you receive a fine
commendation from the Albion
Archaeological Society!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
As I said, I require no such thing.
Simply do your job!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Of course, of course! Oh, and as you are
our generous benefactor in this endeavour,
you will determine how far down we go.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Now then! This is the entrance to the ruins,
and there should still be many fine items
to find here. What say you?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text: This is adequate.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text: Let us go deeper.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
We have arrived at the centre of the ruins,
a location where we have found some truly
rare items in the recent past.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
This is the deepest portion of the ruins.
Even I have rarely ventured down so far,
for it is quite the perilous place.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
What ho! A relic! Here, my good man—
this should prove an appropriate
return on your investment.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text: Oh, I can't wait until my latest paper is published in Archaeology Today— and it's all thanks to you!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Heavens, but this place is dangerous!
We'd best give up and head home.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Mmm. Did that fiend from before drop it?
I think I will be keeping this one.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Heavens, but that was a proper nightmare!
I don't think you're suited for investing,
sir—you take far too many risks.
So please just try to be satisfied with this.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text:
Ho there, man! You're a tourist, yes?
If so, I invite you to enjoy one of my
many poems about the kingdom of Albion!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text:
Ah, a poem. I've not heard a silver-throated
minstrel in some time.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text:
As per your request, I shall now
perform 'Ser Galahad and the Ice Sword.'

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text:
Brave and bold Ser Galahad
His golden hair a'flutter
Did bravely reach the dragon's nest
That made all others shudder. He lopped the vile beast's head clean off
With the Ice Sword in his hand
And thus did the name of Galahad
Ring out throughout the land!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text:
I have just performed one of the
60,419 poems in my repertoire and
will gratefully accept my fee.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text: A fine performance deserves a fine reward.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text: I have nothing to give to you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text: Then piss off and never come back!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.text:
A machine that recites poetry?
My curiosity is raised.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.text:
As per your request, I shall now
perform 'Ser Galahad and the Ice Sword.'

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.text:
The very scenery around me has changed.
Is this the machine's doing?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.text:
And I'm back...but where
has the machine gone?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_020_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_020_CUT_00.text:
As per your request, I shall now
perform 'An Ode to Ser Lancelot.'

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_020_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_020_CUT_00.text:
Ser Lancelot is Albion's pride
So brave and bold and true.
Whenever the kingdom is in peril
The stout knight does come through. But now, alas! A dragon comes!
Breathing flames of fire!
He must fell the beast to save his king
Or Albion shall expire!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.text:
Lancelot, lifting his spear arm high,
Slew the dragon with a swing
And leaving the fell beast on the ground
Ran on to save his king!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.text:
If you are satisfied, I will now
gratefully accept my fee.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_PICKPOCKET_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_PICKPOCKET_000_.text:
You would steal from the Dismal King?
You do not lack for courage, if so.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_PICKPOCKET_010_.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_PICKPOCKET_010_.text: Get yer hands off me, ya nutter!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_PICKPOCKET_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_PICKPOCKET_010_.text: Have you an object such as this?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_STATION_PICKPOCKET_000.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_STATION_PICKPOCKET_000.text:
Looks like you got a bit of rubbish
on your back there, mate. Yoink!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_STATION_PICKPOCKET_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_STATION_PICKPOCKET_000.text: Mmm? My items are gone! She has done this!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_STATION_PICKPOCKET_010.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_STATION_PICKPOCKET_010.text:
Tch! You need to work harder there,
ya skiver. Here, have this.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_STATION_PICKPOCKET_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_STATION_PICKPOCKET_010.text:
I sense darkness from her,
but...cannot be certain.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.text:
Attempting to steal from me?
I applaud your courage.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.text:
I am a lostling. I gather one such as
yourself understands what that implies?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.text:
So you're a lostling. Well, la-di-da!
Still got no idea what yer on about,
and I can't give back what I ain't got.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.text: This would be no fun otherwise.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text:
This new lostling of yours is a
right pain in the arse, Spear.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text:
Caught in the act, eh, Sylvester?
Well, too bad for you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text:
What we have here, mate, is a dodgy
pickpocket by the name of Sylvester. Deftest hands in all of Avalon, they say—
and I swear it's true, because I've not
once caught her in the act. But seems like you were able to make a
proper go of it! That's some fine work,
lad. Some fine work indeed.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text:
Bad look for the Avalon rozzers if they
need strangers to be doin' their jobs!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text:
Keep wailing, Sylvester—we'll have
you singing like a bird for the rest
of your crimes soon enough.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text:
For now, the Yard will confiscate all your
belongings to use as evidence against you—
after which, you'll be expected to repay
your victims for every item you nicked.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text:
And here I thought I'd finally
met someone interesting.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_020.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_020.text:
You sure act smug for such a shabby
lookin' foreigner, lostling!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_020.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_020.text:
But let's start over, mate.
Here's what you're owed from me.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_000.text: So it was you who stole from me.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_000.text:
I applaud your courage in stealing
from lostlings, but this ends now.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_000.text: Then let us do things my way.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_010.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_010.text:
Bloody hell, mate! Looks like I pushed
ya too far and woke the beast.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_020.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_020.text: Yer a right nutter, you are.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_000.text: I expected you might be back.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_000.text:
Thievery is not enough to sate your appetite,
so you target lostlings for an even greater
thrill. Am I wrong in this?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_000.text: There is no escape for you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.text:
Don't go thinkin' you beat me,
lostling. 'Cause ya didn't!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.text: This is the darkness of Avalon.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.text:
Yes, I'm afraid that's one of the more shameful
aspects of Avalon—or all of Albion itself, rather.
Afraid I can't say more than that. Still, you'll be compensated for your
losses, so you'll just have to try and
be satisfied with that.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.text:
Oh, I've no complaints. Quite the contrary,
in fact: this experience has made Avalon
all the more enchanting to my eyes.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_020.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_020.text:
Oi! Looks like ol' Sylvester got
the better of you this time, numpty!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Here at the royal market, we have everything
under the sun. Now all your shopping needs
can be handled at one convenient stop!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_000_010.text:
And for those who aren't looking to shop,
our famous Punch-Up Club is open as well—
and we're accepting all comers! If you've faith in your fists, come give us
your best; our trained fighters stand ready
to trade blows with all worthy adversaries!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I give you the pirate Silver,
Conqueror of the Seven Seas!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Mmm. It appears I will need to
participate in this contest.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_000_040.text:
My, my! A bold young challenger has appeared!
Seems they call this one 'The Lostling.'
Just take a care you don't get lost
on your way to the ring, old chap!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_010_000.text:
Unbelievable! The Conqueror of the
Seven Seas has fallen to The Lostling!
Let's give them a proper hand for putting
up such a brave fight, lads. Oh, and you get a participation award
there, mate, so don't be disappointed.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_010_010.text:
As for The Lostling, his day has just begun!
Now behold your next challenger:
the Warrior-hero Boudica!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_010_020.text:
Well, mate? What do you say?
Audience is frothing to see a
proper fight between you two.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_010_050.text:
Fine, then! Take your winner's award
and get the hell out of here! Oi, did you hear that, lads!? The little lostling
wants to find his mummy and go home!
Let him have it! I want boos to rain down
on him from now to St. Swithin's Day!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_010_060.text:
And our winner is the pirate Silver, Conqueror
of the Seven Seas! Let's give The Lostling a big
hand for fighting so bravely, eh, lads? Oh, and you get a participation award
there, mate, so don't be disappointed.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_020_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_020_000.text:
Blimey, I can't believe it! The Warrior-
hero Boudica has fallen to The Lostling! Let's give Boudica a proper hand for almost
turning that one around, eh, lads? Ah, but
life is cruel, so you'll only be walking
away with a participation award.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_020_010.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_020_010.text:
Right then, ladies and gents!
Who wants to see The Lostling
put up his mitts one more time?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_020_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_020_020.text:
Well then, consider yourselves a bunch of
lucky jammie dodgers, because the market
is about to hold a very special event! You're up for this, eh, Lostling?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_020_050.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_020_050.text:
That's what I wanted to hear!
Now prepare to battle the champion
of the Royal Market Punch-Up Club...

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_020_070.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_020_070.text:
And our winner is the Warrior-hero Boudica!
Let's give The Lostling a big hand for
putting up a right brave scrap, eh, lads? Ah, but life is cruel, so you'll only
walk away with a participation award.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_030_000.text:
Blimey, but this one's strong as anything!
Truly a worthy champion, wouldn't you say, lads?
Now let's blow the roof off the building for
the newest champion of the Royal Market!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_030_020.text:
Come see us again sometimes, eh?
Having the champion around always gets
people excited for the Punch-Up Club!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_030_030.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_000_CUT_030_030.text:
The Lostling put up quite the fight there,
eh, lads? Let's all give him a big
hand for all his hard work! Ah, but life is cruel, so you'll only walk
away with a participation award. Hope you
can avoid getting lost long enough to
find us for a rematch! Bwa ha ha!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Welcome to the Royal Market,
Avalon's premier shopping destination.
Please enjoy all we have to offer.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_000_020.text:
I give you now Avalon's most
hated man...The Yob!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_000_040.text:
But a brave challenger has appeared,
one all of us know as...The Lostling!
Hopefully he can shop without losing
his way—or pay us even if he does! Ha!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_010_000.text:
It's over, lads! It's all over!
The hated Yob has been defeated
by The Fellow Who Gets Lost in Shops! Now let's all jeer the Yob, eh?
No participation award for you, Yobber!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_010_010.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_010_010.text:
Right then, Fellow Who Gets Lost in Shops!
You may have won a single morning match,
but another challenge awaits you:
Rodrigo the Veteran Hero!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_010_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_010_020.text:
Well, mate? What do you say?
Audience is frothing to see a
proper fight between you two.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_010_050.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_010_050.text:
Fine, then! Take your prize
and get the hell out of here! Oi, did you hear that, lads!? The Fellow Who Gets
Lost in Shops has lost his bloody nerve!
Let him have it! I want boos to rain down
on him from now to St. Swithin's Day!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_010_060.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_010_060.text:
And our winner is the Yob! The blasted Yob!
Let's all boo the hell out of The Fellow Who
Gets Lost in Shops for dashing our hopes! Blimey, I'm so cheesed off, I don't even
want to give you a participation award!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_020_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_020_000.text:
Unbelievable! Rodrigo the Veteran Hero
has fallen to The Fellow Who Gets
Lost in Shops! Ah, but life is cruel, so Rodrigo only
walks away with a participation award.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_020_010.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_020_010.text:
Right then, ladies and gents! Who wants
to see The Fellow Who Gets Lost in Shops
put up his mitts one more time?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_020_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_020_020.text:
Well then, consider yourselves a bunch of
lucky jammie dodgers, because the market
is about to hold a very special event! You're up for this, eh,
Fellow Who Gets Lost in Shops?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_020_070.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_020_070.text:
And our winner is the Rodrigo the Veteran Hero!
Let's give The Fellow Who Gets Lost in Shops
a hand for putting up a right brave scrap. Ah, but life is cruel, so you'll only
walk away with a participation award.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_030_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_030_000.text:
Blimey, but this one's strong as anything!
Truly a worthy champion, wouldn't you say, lads?
Now let's blow the roof off the building for
the newest champion of the Royal Market!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_030_030.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_010_CUT_030_030.text:
The Fellow Who Gets Lost in Shops put up quite
the fight there, eh, lads? Let's all give him
a big hand for all his hard work! Ah, but life is cruel, so you'll only walk
away with a participation award. Hope you
can avoid getting lost long enough to
find us for a rematch! Bwa ha ha!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Now this may seem a touch abrupt...
but it's rematch time! You and me!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_020_CUT_000_020.text: Oi! I've done it! You're brown bread, and I've reclaimed the title! Thanks for a proper fight... former champ! Bwa ha!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_MARKET_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Blimey, he cuffed me around again!
I gotta get back to training...

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
This is a hospital, which means
only two types of people come here:
the sick and the injured.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
As you clearly are not injured,
one can only assume you are sick.
We shall operate straightaway.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text: I am in no way unwell.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text: Exactly what a sick person would say. Because of the brain lesions, you see.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Do just lie back and keep calm, sir.
You'll barely feel a poke, and we'll
have you out of here lickity-split!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Keep your hands away, apothecary!
What are you attempting to do!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Aaand...done! Yes, it seems this
operation was a smashing success.
I'll prepare your discharge papers.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
What just happened?
I feel somehow...lighter.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh dear. It appears you're wounded.
We'll need to treat that at once.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.text:
As you do not appear to be either,
we will gladly accept a small
donation of your blood.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.text:
A fellow vampire, are we? Well, you will
have no blood from the Dismal King!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Do just lie back and keep calm.
You'll barely feel a poke, and we'll
have you out of here lickity-split!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.text:
We thank you for your
precious plasma.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.text:
What a terrifying woman...
Blood! I need more blood!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.text:
I wish to access the
cemetery in back.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.text:
The only ones with business in a cemetery
are corpses. We have a hospital right here
for the living, which you most clearly are.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.text:
You are saying I must become a corpse?
Very well. Where in this place do
said corpses congregate?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.text:
When patients die, they're placed in the
morgue and carried out to the cemetery.
But you've no need to worry about that
kind of thing quite yet, sir.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.text:
Is this the morgue? There's no one here.
Ah, to think the Dismal King would play
the part of a corpse! How very droll.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I have made it into the graveyard.
There should be something here
connected to those triangles.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You there! Master of the sepulchre!
Have you seen these triangles before?

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Grave_Digger
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
So you're the errand boy, eh?
Just look for this seal.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Ah, so I am to insert
the pieces into this.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_1.text:
So this is what that man requires?
So be it. Let him have it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.text:
Come all this way just to give us a donation,
didja? 'Cuz I can't imagine why else you'd 
come all the soddin' way out 'ere.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.text: If you wish alms, I will grant them.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.text:
Well, well, boys! Looks like we got
us a right philanthropist 'ere!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.text:
Got ourselves a right wazzock 'ere,
ain't we? Time to teach this git 'ow
things work in this country!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_JACKSTREET_100_CUT_000.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_JACKSTREET_100_CUT_000.text:
Come all this way just to give us a donation,
didja? 'Cuz I can't imagine why else you'd 
come all the soddin' way out 'ere.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_JACKSTREET_100_CUT_000.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_JACKSTREET_100_CUT_000.text:
Oi, one ha'penny. One round ha'penny
to awaken me inner strength!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_JACKSTREET_100_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_JACKSTREET_100_CUT_000.text:
Did this triangle make them transform?
Regardless, I shall take it with me.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_010_00.text:
I deem you worthy. Even should we part,
your soul shall ever be with mine.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_010_01.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_010_01.text:
Thank you for the honour,
O Dismal King!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_00.text:
I deem you worthy. Even should we part,
your soul shall ever be with mine.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Thank you for the honour,
O Dismal King!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_CUT_000_00.text:
I deem you worthy. Even should we part,
your soul shall ever be with mine.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_CUT_000_01.text:
Thank you for the honour,
Dismal King, sir!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_030_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_030_CUT_000_00.text:
I deem you worthy. Even should we part,
your soul shall ever be with mine.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_030_CUT_000_01.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_030_CUT_000_01.text:
You have my most hearty thanks,
O Dismal King!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_040_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_040_CUT_000_00.text:
I deem you worthy. Even should we part,
your soul shall ever be with mine.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_040_CUT_000_01.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_040_CUT_000_01.text: You honour me, O Dismal King.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_050_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_050_CUT_000_00.text:
I deem you worthy. Even should we part,
your soul shall ever be with mine.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_050_CUT_000_01.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_050_CUT_000_01.text:
You honour me, sir!
Honour me, I say!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_060_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_060_CUT_000_00.text:
I deem you worthy. Even should we part,
your soul shall ever be with mine.

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_010.text:
Oi, how is it ya got nothin' on ya!?
Thanks for wastin' me time!

SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_060_CUT_000_01.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_060_CUT_000_01.text:
Thanks heaps for the honour,
O Dismal King...
